document.full_text: sudan's northern army seized control of the disputed, oil-producing abyei region, officials said on sunday, forcing thousands to flee and bringing the country's north and south to the brink of full conflict.
document.title: north sudan seizes disputed abyei, thousands flee
lines_and_colors: sudan's northern army seized control of the disputed, oil-producing abyei region, officials said on sunday, forcing thousands to flee and bringing the country's north and south to the brink of full conflict.
